Summary: oval shape, dark grey flying past WTC in September
divs: sighting detailsi just recently played back a video of 9\11 (someone had filmed) in slow motion (for another reason) and noticed something in slow motion that wasn't there in real time. it is a huge ship, maybe the size of a football field or a little smaller, flying insanely fast (at least a 1000 mph) past the world trade center after the second plane crashed. it is pretty clear in the video on slow speed. i am a pilot, this is not a plane. there is no doubt what it is. it is oval or circular in shape and dark grey. like i said, it is not visible in real time because the speed it too fast for the human eye, just visible in slow motion, but the image is pretty good for caught on film.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 6 other sightings in New York on or around September 11th 2001
